text: Lucky Town is an album by Bruce Springsteen. It was produced by Bruce Springsteen with Jon Landau and Chuck Plotkin. The album was recorded by Toby Scott and mixed by Bob Clearmountain. It was released in 1992 under the copyright of Bruce Springsteen and was distributed by Sony Music. ==Track listing== Bruce Springsteen plays all the instruments except the drums, which are played by Gary Mallabar. ==Related pages== * Bruce Springsteen official website * Lucky Town official website * Sony Music USA Category:1992 albums Category:Bruce Springsteen albums
title: Lucky Town
